nodes.text: The Bakisian Drift was a nebulosity located in the Tragan Cluster, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The notoriously perilous Bakisian Drift prevented the exploration of the Tragan Cluster up until approximately three standard centuries before the Galactic Civil War, when a group of Shistavanen scouts charted the sector, discovering several new sentient species in the Cluster's star systems.

The Bakisian Drift was created by Craig Robert Carey and introduced in Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies, a 1995 sourcebook for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in in grid square N-5.
